name: Chicken and Tortellini Pesto Skillet
author: My Hot Southern Mess
summary: A delicious chicken and tortellini pesto dinner that needs only one pan to create.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat
Add chicken to the skillet and season with salt and pepper
Saute until chicken is cooked through and has browned, 5 to 10 minutes
Remove from skillet and transfer to a bowl; cover to keep warm
Deglaze pan with chicken broth over medium heat, scraping up any browned bits
Stir in pesto and heavy cream
Mix in 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese and stir until melted
Cook until spinach begins to wilt, 3 to 5 minutes
Add tortellini and cooked chicken and continue cooking until bubbly and hot, 5 to 10 minutes
Sprinkle with remaining 1/2 cup of Parmesan cheese and serve
